title: League website problems

embed.description: Album with topic of No Topic, tagged with and ; uploaded by Roguestoney. League website using mobile

body:
It's been like this for a while now. Made a post about it when it first happened but there were too many other issues at that time with regards to new queues being released and new ranked season.

I'm unable to use the news section on mobile as it zooms to what you see in the linked image and I'm not able to change the zoom. So i can only read parts of the information and i cant even get to page 2 of the news section.

Hopefully this is not a large issue to resolve.

replies.body:
I have just tried to test this on my phone for you. 

Im using an iPhone 6 with iOS 10.1 and it seems to be working fine for me. 
So it could be a problem that is specific to samsung/android?

I did notice that ever since they changed the menu bar _(the black one at the top of the page with Game info + Universe + boards etc etc)_ The mobile site has had a lot of problems for me. But this specific problem doesn't seem to be happening for me.

If you give me a little more context, i can experiment and try to find out why mine is working and yours isn't?

Sorry I'm not a tech guy, but ill do what i can to help :P

Well my phone is a Samsung S6. 

The Boards work fine no problems at all other than the notifications are MIA.

not much else to say sorry I'm not tech either :^)

ahh ok, hopefully its just some bug somewhere that will be fixed before you know it. 

sorry i cant really help xD
No worries mate thanks for trying :^)
